content: puffy clouds face scrubby crochet pattern by sarah gross materials g hook 4mm worsted weight cotton yarn #4 scissors needle for weaving in ends gauge scrubby measures approximately 3 ½ inches i tend to crochet tightly so check your gauge and adjust hook size accordingly abbreviations us terms chain chain chain space chain space slip_stitch slip_stitch double_crochet double_crochet puff st puff st s stitch es rs right side ws wrong side special stitches puff yarn over insert hook and draw up a loop 3 loops on hook yarn over insert hook and draw up a loop 5 loops on hook yarn over insert hook and draw up a loop 7 loops on hook yarn over and draw through all 7 loops on hook notes repeat sections are notated with * * chain 3 counts as a double_crochet magic_ring tutorial https //craftykittycrochet com/2018/07/30/magic-ring-a-photo-tutorial/ puff tutorial https //www pinterest com/pin/459085755766245032/ page | 1 puffy clouds face scrubby crochet pattern instructions magic_ring 1 chain 3 counts as double_crochet double_crochet 11 in ring pull ring tight to close slip_stitch to top of chain 3 to join 12 sts 2 chain 2 does not count as a st puff st in same st *chain 1 puff st in next st * repeat around chain 1 slip_stitch to top of first puff st to join 12 puff sts 3 chain 2 does not count as a st puff st in same st *chain 1 puff st in next chain space chain 1 puff st in top of next st * repeat around chain 1 puff st in next chain space chain 1 slip_stitch to first puff st to join 24 puff sts finishing weave in any remaining ends i would love to see your puffy clouds face scrubbies tag me on instagram @craftsbysarahliz so i can see your work *permissions* - you are free to sell what you make from this pattern i would appreciate links back to my blog ravelry or etsy shop to credit me as the designer - you may not use my photos - you may not sell this pattern distribute it or claim it as your own © 2019 sarah gross - crafts by sarah liz page | 2
